level.heading: Construction.
level.text: ยง 27-641 Construction. (a) General. The general provisions of reference standard RS 10-5 relating to erection of steel shall apply. (b) Fitting for wire cable suspenders. (1) Only fittings designed for use with the specific wire cable shall be used. (2) All fittings shall be galvanized in accordance with reference standard RS 10-23. (3) Zinc used for attaching all speltered fittings shall be at least equal to the grade designated as "high grade" in reference standard RS 10-26.
